original: 而且，大江之上潮起潮落，戰船顛簸不定，曹軍深受其苦，不少士兵因為不適應水上生活而病倒，嚴重影響曹軍戰力。
text: Moreover, the ebb and flow on the river and the turbulence of the warship caused Cao Jun to suffer. Many soldiers fell ill because of their inability to adapt to life on the water, which seriously affected Cao Jun's combat effectiveness.
